data.title: Oracle Utilities LODESTAR Developer/Analyst Resume Profile
data.meta_description: Hire IT Professionals for your Projects! Hire Programmers, Hire IT Professionals, IT Staffing, Software Development! Hire Certified and Experienced Professionals on any Skill and Technology. Hire a Single Professional or an Entire Team. Project Managers, Programmers, DBAs, BAs, QAs, Web Developers, Security Specialists and More. Pay hourly with  Zero Payroll Costs and Benefits. We deliver local Talent within few hours of your request with 100% Performance Guarantee.
data.text:
Confidential

Developer/Analyst

Techno-Functional Business resource supporting Entergy's move to the Confidential Midwest Independent System Operator

Researched and documented the requirements for adapting existing systems to work with the new electric grid operator

Created updated Confidential Rates and Riders as needed for MISO Business Service and requirement documentation

Wrote PL/SQL and VB.NET code to reconcile data between LODESTAR Billing Expert and PCI GenManager

Provided Application Production Support concurrently with development

Utilized CVS for source code control

Confidential

Solution Designer

STI provides sales tax rates to retail companies through an ASP.NET application and Web Service. This allows Internet and mail-order vendors to collect the correct sales tax for sales made in all states.

Designed a SQL Server 2008 database used to store online transactions and tax base data

Developed Business Requirement and Functional Design documentation

Established a SharePoint system to track important SDLC documentation and approval workflow

Built several reports using SSRS SQL Server Reporting Services

Utilized Team Confidential for source code control
